feature.evaluation

Class InfoGain

  • java.lang.Object
    • feature.evaluation.SplitAssesment
      • feature.evaluation.InfoGain

  • public class InfoGain
extends SplitAssesment
    This class implements the calculations of the information gain on feature value splits in the data.
